pullrequest.title: Add a new semi-supervised test case

content.raw:
I realize there is actually a training error in simpleseg, would it be a good idea to make the semisupervised label to be that training error period?

https://bitbucket.org/Tamaki_Sakura/segway/src/97d309d8ee69ec0717a785eb6df1f24bf3f5c788/test/simpleseg/touchstone/identifydir/viterbi/viterbi0.bed?at=semi_test_case

0-2000 and 4000-6000 are treated as 1, where 0-1000 is different from 1000-2000. Assigning 0-1000 and 4000-5000 a semisupervised label 0 will fix this problem.

0-2000 and 4000-6000 are treated as 1, where 0-1000 is different from 1000-2000. Assigning 0-1000 and 4000-5000 a semisupervised label 0 will fix this problem.
